head1.heading: Unleashing Creativity - Tailwind CSS
head1.paragraph: Our mission is to make the design process more accessible and efficient for everyone. Whether you are a seasoned developer looking for inspiration or a beginner taking your first steps into the world of web design, our platform offers a wealth of resources tailored to your needs.

list.l1: Search any component with search bar from various developers.
list.l2: contribute to open source for more tailwind components.
list.l3: Create your own component to help other developers.
list.l4: Create posts from New Posts section.
list.l5: And that's it you are ready to go.

questions.question: What is Style Share ?
questions.answer: Style Share is a simple web-based platform where users can contribute, create, explore, and share web design components, focusing on Tailwind CSS.

questions.question: How does it work ?
questions.answer: Users can search any component with search bar from various developers, contribute to open source for more Tailwind components, create their own component to help other developers, and create posts from the 'New Posts' section.

questions.question: Who can use Style Share ?
questions.answer: Whether you are a seasoned developer looking for inspiration or a beginner taking your first steps into the world of web design, Style Share offers a wealth of resources tailored to your needs.

questions.question: Is there a cost to use Style Share ?
questions.answer: No, Style Share is completely free to use.

questions.question: How do I contribute to Style Share ?
questions.answer: You can contribute by creating your own components and sharing them on the platform. You can also help improve existing components.
